definition: complaint letter/petition letter/see also 上訪|上访[shang4 fang3]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Yesterday, they receive province letter one case to visit bureau the letter that come around seeks a case.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，他们就接到一起省信访局转来的信访案件。

sentences.english: Yesterday, they receive province letter one case to visit bureau the letter that come around seeks a case.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，他们就接到一起省信访局转来的信访案件。

sentences.english: Suggestion by letter arid visit is a non-juristic system with great Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 信访制度是一项具有中国特色的非法律性制度。

sentences.english: Zhang Ling's husband, family letters and visits from high-jumped a tree or high paraplegia .

sentences.english: Statistical work shall be subject to public supervision.

sentences.english: The resolution-by-visit-and-mail is a democratic and legal institution which is urgent in need of perfection.
sentences.chinese: 信访制度是我国当今迫切需要完善的民主法律制度。

sentences.chinese: 国家信访局如果只是转送，谁又来督办呢？

sentences.english: The work of petition to public security is a basic task of building harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 公安信访工作是构建和谐社会的一项基础性工作。

sentences.english: Suggestion by letter and visit is a non-juristic system with great Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 信访制度是一项具有中国特色的非法律性制度。

sentences.english: Letter and Visit of Military is playing a unique role in the society of our country.
sentences.chinese: 军队信访工作在我国社会生活中发挥着独特的作用。

sentences.english: The fourth part of the"letter and visit"system is the work of the problems that exist.
sentences.chinese: 第四部门是目前信访工作中存在的题目。

sentences.english: Petitioners are also routinely denied access to government offices in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 信访者亦常常被拒绝接触设在北京的政府机构。

sentences.english: It is Shangqiu City Party Committee that provided the number.
sentences.chinese: 商丘市委给宁陵县信访局提供的这个数。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 analyzes the system predicament which LLC encounter in current.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析涉诉信访的制度困境。

sentences.english: There's a department in our country, it's called the Letters and Petitions Office.
sentences.chinese: 我们国家有一个部门，叫做信访办。

definition: to seek an audience with higher-ups (esp. government officials) to petition for sth
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
mass incident (PRC term for incidents of social unrest, including rioting, melees and petition campaigns)
public security authorities, acronym from 公安局[gong1 an1 ju2], 檢察院|检察院[jian3 cha2 yuan4] and 法院[fa3 yuan4]
